text:
M. Saravanan (29) of Periyar Street in Kalkandarkottai was murdered on Saturday. Sources said a group of assailants, armed with lethal weapons, attacked him.

His body was found on a field at Kalkandarkottai.

On information, police rushed to the spot and began enquiry.

There was no immediate information on the motive of murder.

Tiruverumbur police have filed a case.
title: Youth murdered at Kalkandarkottai
